about_the_game:
In the desolate aftermath of a pitched battle between the nature-loving Bloodwarders and the Industrial Terrans, you step into the worn boots of a Panther Commando, Edward—a last-ditch operative sent to complete the unthinkable. Your mission: infiltrate the heart of a damaged planet cracker, a colossal machine once used to tear celestial bodies apart for their resources, now left derelict to float over the vast expanse of space.

  • Dash across chasms, swing across damaged conduits, and scale the remnants of the planet cracker, a maze of twisted corridors, rusted catwalks, and malfunctioning machinery.
  • Fight with brutal hand-to-hand attacks and deliver combos beat-em-up style! Your enemies won't know what him them.
  • Explore a broken world, fight dangerous wildlife and synthetic contraptions. All of them out to kill you!
